edu.ucsb.cs56.games.client_server.v2.server.Controllers

Class JavaServerTemplate

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucsb.cs56.games.client_server.v2.server.Controllers.JavaServerTemplate
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    JavaServer

    public abstract class JavaServerTemplate
extends java.lang.Object
    This abstract class stores the most basic methods(mostly getters and setters) and MainThread class for JavaClient.
    Version:
    for CS56, Spring 2017
    Author:
    David Roster, Harrison Wang

      creates an action listener to listen for transactions between server and its widgets

      Can change the potential server gui window - mostly used for creation of the server window primarily

      Can redefine the port number of the server

      Used to create thread that our server runs on to connect with potential clients
